Posts.Content: I am also. Write me privately to discuss it. I can't seem to figure out how to do so, don't want to discuss on forum. Thanks. Linda.
Posts.Title: Divorce and Breast Cancer

Posts.Content: Make the doctor talk to you..the MS is talking to her (morphine). and she probably needs it right now. Take care, OK? You keep by her side. That's most important if you can...or just on phone..doesn't matter if you understand her...she knowsÂ  you're there. she is sure to appreciate it dear. Linda McC
